Ninja Express

Compositing

Ninja Express S01 - trailer from Creative Conspiracy (CC).

Ninja Express is a fun animated tv-show produced by Creative Conspiracy, a production company based in Gent.
More information can be found on the Creative Conspiracy Website.

I've worked as a Fusion compositor on this project.
My role was episode lead, creating templates and establishing the look of each episode, that would then be picked up by the rest of the team.

Below are some examples of shots ive worked on, before and after.

  • Blackmagic Fusion
